subject: How to test setBusinessObject
msgSnippet: I am new to JUnit and Maverick and need some pointers on how to test functionality of setBusinessObject.  I cannot figure out how to trigger setBusinessObject
messageBody:
I am new to JUnit and Maverick and need some pointers on how to test
functionality of setBusinessObject. I cannot figure out how to
trigger setBusinessObject and how to test it. I keep getting
nullpointer exceptions, so I am thinking that I am not initializing
things correctly. Any examples and/or pointers would be appreciated.

Thanks,
Angela
